item.title: Favorite Albums of 2019
item.description: The Playlist Here’s all the albums I really loved this year easily accessible as an Apple Playlist. The Albums 1) Cheap Queen — King Princess Bless lesbian musicians. King Princess first caught my attention with the song Pussy is God, which damn. This album is a bop. 2) Emily Alone — Florist A deeply sparse, sad album that I enjoy quite a bit. Florist has always made beautiful songs, but this is a so quiet and so delightful.
